channel.title: Pavel Shikhov - Software Developer
channel.description: Recent content on Pavel Shikhov - Software Developer

item.title: First Post
item.description: In this blog, I will write about my experience of building software. Currently I am working on a Python project - a contact book with an advanced functionality. The goal of my doing this is to learn the ins and outs of the Django framework. Soon there will be a post to cover my advancements.
